generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, curving through the scene.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the left side of the road, bordered by trees and a curb.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a large historical-style building in the center and a modern building on the right with a parking sign.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the right side of the road, separating the road from a grassy area.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one holding a traffic sign on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating parking (P) and directions is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees are visible on the left side of the road and in front of the buildings.
- terrain: Grass is visible in the foreground and along the right side of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: A person riding a bicycle is visible on the left side of the road.
- rider: The person riding the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the left side of the road, being ridden by a person.
- car: The front of a car (with the Mercedes-Benz logo) is visible at the bottom of the image, indicating the perspective of the vehicle.
